summary: The implementation successfully addresses most requirements for the JP Global Accounting rebrand. All 10 requirements (REQ-11 through REQ-20) show evidence of implementation across color scheme updates, content changes, branding updates, and layout enhancements. The diff demonstrates comprehensive changes to navigation, footer, pages, and styling with the new Deep Navy Blue and Gold theme.

hallucinated_features.description: Added Testimonials section/component with 3 client testimonials on Home page
hallucinated_features.reason: Testimonials component exists in diff (Testimonials.tsx) and is imported/rendered on Home page, but testimonials were not mentioned in REQ-11 through REQ-20. This appears to be a feature from earlier requirements (REQ-6 from project_state.json) or carried over functionality.

hallucinated_features.description: Image reference to 'why-choose-global.dim_800x600.png' in WhyChooseUs component
hallucinated_features.reason: This image was not specified in the BuildRequest images required list. The BuildRequest specified 5 specific images, none matching this filename pattern.

hallucinated_features.description: Software Expertise section on Services page (truncated in diff)
hallucinated_features.reason: The Services page shows evidence of a 'Software Expertise' section at the bottom (visible in truncated portion). REQ-14 specifies exactly 6 service blocks with no mention of an additional software expertise section.
